public static @NotNull javafx.scene.control.TextFormatter<java.lang.Double> createDecimalTextFormatter(double defaultValue)
        Create a DecimalFormater. It when is attached a textfield only let valid values for a decimal

        the formatter

      • createDecimalTextFormatter

        @NotNull
public static @NotNull javafx.scene.control.TextFormatter<java.lang.Double> createDecimalTextFormatter()
        Create a DecimalFormater. It when is attached a textfield only let valid values for a decimal. A call to this method is the same that call createDecimalTextFormatter(double) with 0 as value.
        Returns:
        the formatter
